params.name: key_states
params.description: The new key states to cache.

params.name: value_states
params.description: The new value states to cache.

params.name: layer_idx
params.description: The index of the layer to cache the states for.

params.name: cache_kwargs
params.description: Additional arguments for the cache subclass. The following arguments can be used in SinkCache: sin,cos and partial_rotation_size. These arguments are used with models using RoPE, to recompute therotation as the tokens are shifted.
